$interpreted: Wendel: Slaying beasts is my job as a soldier! I can't just stay by the sidelines!!
Ace: Don't push yourself, just keep yourself alive.
Wendel: Sir... are you hurt!?
Soldier Guard: Sir Ace, I've finally found you! We heard beasts from a little ways off, and... thankfully you're okay---
Ace: You two stay here and make sure every last beast is dead, or they'll start attacking nearby villages.
Soldier Guard: Yes sir!
Ace: As for you, running away like that... I will report it to the commander.
Wendel: O-Okay, Sir Aldric... thank you for saving me! I'll be in your debt for the rest of my life!
Ace: No need. Protecting the kingdom's people is my responsibility.
Wendel: Ah! Sir, please wait for me!
Wendel: You know, you're a lot like another soldier I know! Your talent with a sword, and how cool you both are...
Ace: If you don't have anything important to say, it would be better to keep quiet. Save your energy.
Wendel: Wow, you even talk like her! You're both really so similar!
Wendel: She... she's always been so patient with me, teaching me everything she knows. And when I asked why she was helping me, she said...
Wendel: She said it's because she has a brother that loves her very much~
Wendel: I told her I joined the army to make a better life for my sister, Jenna, and she said she could understand...
Wendel: I'm sure that her brother is just as warmhearted as she is!
Wendel: Her name's Sione! I'm sure you two would get along~
Ace: ...Is that so.
Ace: What else did she say?
Wendel: Oh, you wanna know more? Well, she also said---
Jenna: Wendel!!!
Wendel: Jenna!? What are you doing here~!? Is it visiting day!? I'm so happy to see you!
Jenna: You dummy, I'm so happy you're safe...
Ace: Sione...
Sione: Brother, are you hurt?
Ace: (Sione does care about me... I should have known not to get so worried.)
Ace: I'm fine, just a scratch.
Ace: ...Nothing to worry about...
Ace: (Hair length normal, face color natural, clothing neat and tidy... good, I can relax.)
Ace: The soldiers did their jobs. I will rightfully commend them when I return.
Sione: Ace, you really worry about me too much.
Sione: ………
Sione: I just heard from some of the others that you didn't put any pressure on the captain, regarding Wendel.
Sione: I had no proof but I still doubted you like that... I really owe you an apology.
Sione: As an Aldric, I can't keep letting you down, brother.
Ace: Worry not, the barracks have their own laws, and I shouldn't get involved.
Ace: And I will not harm those you care so deeply about...
Ace: I will simply be a good brother to you.
Ace: Just like I convinced mother and father to let you join the army.
Ace: And now, no matter who you have feelings for...
Ace: I will do all I can to remove every obstacle in your path.
Sione: I figured... Brother, you've misunderstood.
Sione: I... I don't have feelings for anyone.
Ace: What!?
Sione: In fact...
Sione: Doing my best to be just like you, a fantastic soldier... and giving my all for the good of the kingdom...
Sione: That is most important to me right now!
Ace: ...Good to hear it.
Ace: Mother and father would be proud of you.
Ace: (That means...)
Ace: (The one Sione likes best is still me, her caring brother!)
Sione: ...Ace.
Ace: ...Hmph.
Ace: ...I'm very unimpressed with your captain today. I must report it to the commander and have him duly punished.
Ace: And as far as those rumors go, I plan to---
Sione: Rumors are just rumors, Ace, they'll go away on their own. I don't plan on doing anything about them.
Sione: But before they do go away, I want to ask you not to come over here and check up on me so much.
Sione: Ace!
Ace: I promise, I won't... but...
Ace: Be safe, and don't let any of these chumps bother you.
Sione: Ace... you're my brother, lord of the Aldric family. You carry such burden, so much responsibility, both foreign and domestic.
Sione: And because of that, you never take time for yourself.
Sione: So my only wish is for you to be happy, Ace.
Sione: I hope you can start taking care of yourself more.
Ace: Sione...
Sione: (Man, Ace really needs a girlfriend...)
Nervous Guard: Well, isn't that a happy ending! And Sione didn't have feelings for Wendel in the end, after all! Wonderful!
Nervous Guard: ...What's wrong? What's with that face?
Quiet Guard: I think that Sir Ace should be a little bit worried about Jenna's wishing stone.
Nervous Guard: You mean... you think she's wishing for Wendel and Sione to get together?
Quiet Guard: It could be... Even if Sione doesn't have feelings for him now, if they keep spending time together...
Ace: That stone might have an effect on them.
Ace: I almost forgot about that.
Jenna: Ah, Sir Ace!?
Jenna: Did you forget something?
Wendel: Sir Ace, please, we haven't had a chance to thank you yet---
Wendel: ......
Wendel: Was Sir Ace just giving me the evil eye?
Diviner: I know I was wrong, please forgive me...
Ace: I will forgive you of your misreading if you do one thing for me.
Ace: Give me every wishing stone you have.
Diviner: ...Eh?
Ace: ...Good. All of these will definitely overpower anything that Jenna has.
Ace: (I wish that Sione would continue to like me best... for just a little longer...)

Model.Text: Slaying beasts is my job as a soldier! I can't just stay by the sidelines!!
Don't push yourself, just keep yourself alive.
Sir... are you hurt!?
Sir Ace, I've finally found you! We heard beasts from a little ways off, and... thankfully you're okay---
You two stay here and make sure every last beast is dead, or they'll start attacking nearby villages.
Yes sir!
As for you, running away like that... I will report it to the commander.
O-Okay, Sir Aldric... thank you for saving me! I'll be in your debt for the rest of my life!
No need. Protecting the kingdom's people is my responsibility.
Ah! Sir, please wait for me!
You know, you're a lot like another soldier I know! Your talent with a sword, and how cool you both are...
If you don't have anything important to say, it would be better to keep quiet. Save your energy.
Wow, you even talk like her! You're both really so similar!
She... she's always been so patient with me, teaching me everything she knows. And when I asked why she was helping me, she said...
She said it's because she has a brother that loves her very much~
I told her I joined the army to make a better life for my sister, Jenna, and she said she could understand...
I'm sure that her brother is just as warmhearted as she is!
Her name's Sione! I'm sure you two would get along~
...Is that so.
What else did she say?
Oh, you wanna know more? Well, she also said---
Wendel!!!
Jenna!? What are you doing here~!? Is it visiting day!? I'm so happy to see you!
You dummy, I'm so happy you're safe...
Sione...
Brother, are you hurt?
(Sione does care about me... I should have known not to get so worried.)
I'm fine, just a scratch.
...Nothing to worry about...
(Hair length normal, face color natural, clothing neat and tidy... good, I can relax.)
The soldiers did their jobs. I will rightfully commend them when I return.
Ace, you really worry about me too much.
I just heard from some of the others that you didn't put any pressure on the captain, regarding Wendel.
I had no proof but I still doubted you like that... I really owe you an apology.
As an Aldric, I can't keep letting you down, brother.
Worry not, the barracks have their own laws, and I shouldn't get involved.
And I will not harm those you care so deeply about...
I will simply be a good brother to you.
Just like I convinced mother and father to let you join the army.
And now, no matter who you have feelings for...
I will do all I can to remove every obstacle in your path.
I figured... Brother, you've misunderstood.
I... I don't have feelings for anyone.
What!?
In fact...
Doing my best to be just like you, a fantastic soldier... and giving my all for the good of the kingdom...
That is most important to me right now!
...Good to hear it.
Mother and father would be proud of you.
(That means...)
(The one Sione likes best is still me, her caring brother!)
...Ace.
...Hmph.
...I'm very unimpressed with your captain today. I must report it to the commander and have him duly punished.
And as far as those rumors go, I plan to---
Rumors are just rumors, Ace, they'll go away on their own. I don't plan on doing anything about them.
But before they do go away, I want to ask you not to come over here and check up on me so much.
Ace!
I promise, I won't... but...
Be safe, and don't let any of these chumps bother you.
Ace... you're my brother, lord of the Aldric family. You carry such burden, so much responsibility, both foreign and domestic.
And because of that, you never take time for yourself.
So my only wish is for you to be happy, Ace.
I hope you can start taking care of yourself more.
Sione...
(Man, Ace really needs a girlfriend...)
Well, isn't that a happy ending! And Sione didn't have feelings for Wendel in the end, after all! Wonderful!
...What's wrong? What's with that face?
I think that Sir Ace should be a little bit worried about Jenna's wishing stone.
You mean... you think she's wishing for Wendel and Sione to get together?
It could be... Even if Sione doesn't have feelings for him now, if they keep spending time together...
That stone might have an effect on them.
I almost forgot about that.
Ah, Sir Ace!?
Did you forget something?
Sir Ace, please, we haven't had a chance to thank you yet---
Was Sir Ace just giving me the evil eye?
I know I was wrong, please forgive me...
I will forgive you of your misreading if you do one thing for me.
Give me every wishing stone you have.
...Good. All of these will definitely overpower anything that Jenna has.
(I wish that Sione would continue to like me best... for just a little longer...)

I don't plan on doing anything about them.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_26_001","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0020","IconName":"h0020s3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But before they do go away, I want to ask you not to come over here and check up on me so much.","sfxName":"h0020_story_025","sfxVolume":0.7},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_27_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_27_001","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"..........","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_27_002","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026\u2026","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_28_000","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0020","IconName":"h0020s3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ace!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_28_001","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I promise, I won't... but...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_28_002","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Be safe, and don't let any of these chumps bother you.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_29_000","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0020","IconName":"h0020s3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ace... you're my brother, lord of the Aldric family. You carry such burden, so much responsibility, both foreign and domestic.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_29_001","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0020","IconName":"h0020s3_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"And because of that, you never take time for yourself.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_30_000","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0020","IconName":"h0020s3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"So my only wish is for you to be happy, Ace.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_30_001","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0020","IconName":"h0020s3_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I hope you can start taking care of yourself more.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_30_002","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_delight","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sione...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_31_000","SpeakerName":"Sione","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0020","IconName":"h0020s3_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(Man, Ace really needs a girlfriend...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_32_000","SpeakerName":"Nervous Guard","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3544c3","IconName":"h3544c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Well, isn't that a happy ending! And Sione didn't have feelings for Wendel in the end, after all! Wonderful!","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_33_000","SpeakerName":"Nervous Guard","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3544c3","IconName":"h3544c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...What's wrong? What's with that face?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_33_001","SpeakerName":"Quiet Guard","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3544c3","IconName":"h3544c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I think that Sir Ace should be a little bit worried about Jenna's wishing stone.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_33_002","SpeakerName":"Nervous Guard","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3544c3","IconName":"h3544c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You mean... you think she's wishing for Wendel and Sione to get together?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_33_003","SpeakerName":"Quiet Guard","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3544c3","IconName":"h3544c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It could be... Even if Sione doesn't have feelings for him now, if they keep spending time together...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_33_004","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"","IconName":"0_no_face","IconLocate":2,"Text":"That stone might have an effect on them.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_34_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_sp3","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I almost forgot about that.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_35_000","SpeakerName":"Jenna","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0081c2","IconName":"h0081c2_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ah, Sir Ace!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_36_000","SpeakerName":"Jenna","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0081c2","IconName":"h0081c2_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Did you forget something?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_36_001","SpeakerName":"Wendel","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3545c3","IconName":"h3545c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sir Ace, please, we haven't had a chance to thank you yet---","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_37_000","SpeakerName":"Wendel","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3545c3","IconName":"h3545c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_37_001","SpeakerName":"Wendel","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3545c3","IconName":"h3545c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Was Sir Ace just giving me the evil eye?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_38_000","SpeakerName":"Diviner","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3367c3","IconName":"h3367c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I know I was wrong, please forgive me...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_38_001","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I will forgive you of your misreading if you do one thing for me.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_39_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_sp2","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Give me every wishing stone you have.","sfxName":"h0179sx_story_002","sfxVolume":0.8},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_39_001","SpeakerName":"Diviner","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3367c3","IconName":"h3367c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Eh?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_40_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Good. All of these will definitely overpower anything that Jenna has.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0179_005_dialog_english##_41_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_delight","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(I wish that Sione would continue to like me best... for just a little longer...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
